name: Rayuela (GoatCarpet)
description:
GoatCarpet brings you this classic children's game, now for your cellphone!

Throw the marker at the marked square, and then hop all the way to the end and back!

Game features:

Thought for children

Simple interface // Simple, easy-to-use controls

No internet connection required
